best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Keep content hierarchy clear: image > title > supporting text > actions.
Ensure text has adequate contrast over images or use overlays.
Tap targets (e.g., buttons) should be at least 44×44 px.
Do not rely solely on hover effects; provide visible focus states.
Avoid excessive shadow on mobile to reduce visual noise.
